pullrequest.title: Add Insert tab to model editor

content.raw:
Just a couple of GUI comments which don't need to be addressed in this PR. Probably @spaepcke will have more in-depth comments.

* Maybe I'm too used to the current palette, but I think having the model tree appear by default might be more useful than the list of models to insert

* We should find a way to make it clear that simple and custom shapes are inserted as links while the rest are inserted as models
content.html:
Just a couple of GUI comments which don't need to be addressed in this PR. Probably @spaepcke will have more in-depth comments.

  • Maybe I'm too used to the current palette, but I think having the model tree appear by default might be more useful than the list of models to insert

  • We should find a way to make it clear that simple and custom shapes are inserted as links while the rest are inserted as models
